item.title: Brittany add a quote by Mark Z. Danielewski
Brittany add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The one you love and the one who loves you are never, ever the same person." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Brittany add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Brittany add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "It's the job that's never started as takes longest to finish." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Brittany add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "A single dream is more powerful than a thousand realities." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "An intellectual says a simple thing in a hard way. An artist says a hard thing in a simple way." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Brittany add a quote by charles bukowski
item.description: "If you're losing your soul and you know it, then you've still got a soul left to lose" -- charles bukowski

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Poetry is what happens when nothing else can." -- Charles Bukowski
